name: Ball Defence!
description:
The best Toxicity! Simple game play!
‘Ball Defence’ is a game of breaking up the blocks from four directions using a ball from a cannon.

Change the going off directions of a ball touching the screen.
Break up the blocks that are located near the cannon first.
If you break up the special blocks appearing sometimes during the game play, special skill arouses.
Get the point and Upgrade your cannon. The quicker! The stronger!
Break a personal record and share it with your friends!

[Features]
Free game
Simple one touch- control
Unlimited level
Cannon upgrade system
Special block, special skill

[Cautions]
1. Please be noted that data is initialized when you change your cellphone or you delete the App(application) from your cellphone.
2. Please be noted that there are partial chargeable items and ads.
